title: Coconut cream cheese icing
ingredients: ['200g cream cheese, softened', '100g unsalted butter, softened', '500g icing sugar', '2 tablespoons double cream', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon coconut flavouring (optional)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '50g desiccated coconut', '75g desiccated coconut, toasted (optional)']
